BTC RSI hits lowest level since July 2021. Bitfinex longs continue to grow aggressively. BTC hashrate hits another ATH. BTC could hit $90k on Trump election: Bernstein. We’ve seen meme coins like Dogwifhat (WIF) soar to huge market caps and we’ve seen political meme coins crash as the candidate drops out (BODEN). Liu explains the data behind all of this.

articles.description: Crypto falls on macro wobble, Yen fears. OI wiped in BTC drop to $56k, funding negative. Altcoins down 13% YTD, stablecoin supply up 30%. BTC mining profitability at record low: JP Morgan. FBI says North Korea targeting BTC ETF issuers. Trump family to launch DeFi project on ETH. Trump project linked to AVAX’s Dough Finance. Trump family members hacked during launch. AI coins underperform after Nvidia investigation. MATIC upgrade to POL begins. TON falls as Telegram faces issues in many countries. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto’s ‘corporate phase’. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.

Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Dogecoin (DOGE) whales are on the prowl for their next big win, and they’ve set their sights on GoodEgg (GEGG), an AI-driven dating cryptocurrency with immense growth potential. As these influential investors shift their attention to GEGG, the stage is set for massive gains—100x gains, according to some experts.
 
Dogecoin (DOGE) Breaks Key Levels, But Whales Are Diversifying 
Dogecoin (DOGE) has seen an impressive surge recently, breaking through the $0.10 resistance level and trading at $0.10510, a 30.62% increase over the past 39 days. As Elon Musk continues to fuel excitement with his Dogefather persona, Dogecoin (DOGE) remains one of the most watched cryptos in the market.
 
Despite its strong performance, many Dogecoin (DOGE) whales are choosing to diversify, moving some of their hol…
articles.title: gecoin Whale Embrace New AI Dating Token GoodEgg (GEGG) As They Hunt For 100x Gains

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency space is constantly evolving, with new tokens entering the market every day, seeking to dethrone long-standing leaders. GoodEgg (GEGG), an AI-driven dating cryptocurrency, is rapidly gaining traction, drawing attention away from established players like Shiba Inu (SHIB). With 79.96% of GEGG tokens sold in its first presale stage and a price increase on the horizon, many investors are wondering: can Shiba Inu keep up with GoodEgg’s epic rise and profit potential?
 
Shiba Inu: Once a Meme Coin Giant, Now Struggling?
 
Shiba Inu (SHIB) has been a popular meme coin, often regarded as a “Dogecoin killer” when it first entered the market. With its mascot, the Shiba Inu dog, SHIB quickly gained a loyal following, boasting a large community of investors. In early 2024, the token…
articles.title: Can Shiba Inu Keep Up With New AI Dating Token GoodEgg Epic Rise and Profit Potential

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Shiba Inu (SHIB) has long been a dominant force in the world of meme coins, capturing the imagination of crypto enthusiasts and casual investors alike. However, as the cryptocurrency landscape continues to evolve, new contenders are emerging that threaten to dethrone established players like SHIB. One such contender is GoodEgg (GEGG), an AI-driven dating cryptocurrency that experts believe could outperform Shiba Inu (SHIB) in 2024, with potential 100X returns. In this article, we will explore why analysts are bullish on GEGG and how it stacks up against Shiba Inu (SHIB).
 
Shiba Inu (SHIB): A Memecoin Veteran 
Shiba Inu (SHIB) has enjoyed widespread success since its inception, becoming one of the most recognizable names in the meme coin sector. Originally launched as a “Dogecoin killer,” …
articles.title: Shiba Inu Vs GoodEgg: Experts Say GEGG 100X Potential Will Overtake Shiba Inu In 2024

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Dogecoin (DOGE) investors are always on the lookout for opportunities to maximize their returns. With Dogecoin (DOGE) consistently reclaiming key levels, many investors are eyeing new horizons in the crypto space. One of the most exciting opportunities on the radar of Dogecoin holders is the rising AI dating cryptocurrency, GoodEgg (GEGG), which experts predict could skyrocket by 100x.
 
Dogecoin’s Recent Gains and Market Impact 
Dogecoin (DOGE), often the catalyst of memecoin rallies, has seen substantial price movements in recent weeks. After a period of consolidation around the $0.098 mark, Dogecoin (DOGE) finally reclaimed the psychological $0.10 level, flipping it into support. This was a significant move, as experts believe that once Dogecoin (DOGE) holds this level, it could potenti…
articles.title: Dogecoin Holders Boost Their Profits With AI Dating Crypto GoodEgg (GEGG) Experts See 100x Future

articles.author: Semilore Faleti
articles.description:
Prominent altcoin Solana (SOL)  was one of many cryptocurrencies to recently catch investors’ attention, gaining by 7.21% in the last week according to data from CoinMarketCap. Amidst this rally, Solana reclaimed the $140 price zone, a price point last seen in June. Interestingly, on-chain analytics company Santiment has now shared some developments in the Solana market that may signal a sustained bullish momentum. 
 
 
Low Trading Activity Accompanies Solana Price Gain, But No Problem: Santiment 
 
On Saturday, Santiment reported that certain assets have experienced a rise in open interest as a result of the recent crypto market rally. Notably, the open interest in Bitcoin, the leading cryptocurrency, reached approximately $12.2 billion with the Ethereum (ETH) market recording a significa…
articles.title: Solana’s Price Surge Sees Low Open Interest – A Bullish Signal?

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The Shiba Inu (SHIB) community is no stranger to the ups and downs of the cryptocurrency market, but recent developments have given SHIB holders reason to celebrate. After the largest weekly Shiba Inu (SHIB) burn in recent history and a price rebound, many investors are now using their profits to explore new and exciting opportunities. One such opportunity that has caught the attention of Shiba Inu holders is Shiba Inu (SHIB), a new AI-powered dating token that has taken the market by storm. With its innovative approach to blending AI technology with decentralized finance, GoodEgg (GEGG) is positioning itself as the next big thing in the crypto world.
 
The Largest Shiba Inu Burn and Its Impact 
Shiba Inu’s deflationary tokenomics have been one of its key selling points, and the recent bur…
articles.title: Shiba Inu Holders Use Recent Profits On New Crypto GoodEGG That’s Taken The Market By Storm

articles.author: Terence Zimwara
articles.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Binance has alerted users to a rise in “Clipper malware” attacks that can steal crypto funds. The malware intercepts wallet addresses, replacing them with attackers’. Binance said it has implemented security measures and provided tips to users, including verifying app authenticity, checking withdrawal addresses, and staying updated on security advisories. Clipper Malware Attacks […]
articles.title: Binance Warns of Malware Targeting Crypto Addresses, Urges Users to Always Verify

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: HTX has announced the integration of Bitcoin’s Lightning Network, a second-layer payments protocol designed to facilitate faster and cheaper transactions. This move aims to enhance the efficiency of Bitcoin payments and withdrawals on the platform, significantly reducing transaction times and costs. The integration is part of a strategic partnership with IBEX, a fintech company specializing […]
articles.title: HTX Integrates Lightning Network for Faster Bitcoin Payments

articles.author: Sebastian Villafuerte
articles.description:
Bitcoin is at a pivotal moment after enduring weeks of aggressive corrections and underwhelming price action. Currently testing the crucial psychological level at $60,000, the cryptocurrency faces a critical phase where investor sentiment is shifting from fear to cautious optimism. 
 
 
This transition comes as many anticipate a potential rally in the coming weeks. Top macro and on-chain analysts, including experts from CryptoQuant, have highlighted that if Bitcoin can break through the significant resistance at $69,500, it may trigger a substantial move toward new highs. 
 
The data suggests that such a breakout could ignite a bullish uptrend, pushing Bitcoin into previously uncharted territory. This critical price point, therefore, could be the key to determining direction in the near te…
articles.title: Bitcoin Rally Expected Once Price Breaks $69,500 – FOMO Likely?

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: The recent closure of a Bitcoin data center in the Norwegian municipality of Hadsel has resulted in power hikes for citizens due to the inability to allocate the energy used by the operation to other purposes. While citizens and Hadsel’s mayor celebrated this development because of the noise emitted by the site, they now face […]
articles.title: Closure of Bitcoin Mining Center Causes Spike in Power Bills for Citizens in Norwegian Municipality

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
Despite seeing multiple crashes over the last few months, the expectations for the Bitcoin (BTC) price remain incredibly high following a spike in exchange-traded fund (ETF) inflows. Leading this forecast is crypto analyst Micky Bull, who has unveiled another bullish prediction, putting the BTC price above the coveted $100,000 mark.
 
Bitcoin ETFs Positive Inflow To Trigger Bitcoin Price Surge
 
The U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs saw positive inflows of $39.02 million on September 12, 2024, marking a reversal from previous low volumes. Conversely, Ethereum ETFs experienced a net outflow of $20.14 million, with some ETFs registering no change.
 
 
 
Typically, positive inflows occur when the cost basis for ETF investors ( the original value of BTC for tax purposes) exceeds Bitcoin’s current price. …
articles.title: Bitcoin Price Forecasted To Reach $112,000, Here’s The Trigger

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: San Luis Obispo County Sheriff’s detectives in California, United States, have recovered nearly $5,000 of the $17,000 stolen in a cryptocurrency scam targeting victims in Los Osos two years ago. On Sept. 12, 2022, the victims informed authorities that they were deceived by a scammer posing as a relative in legal trouble, leading them to […]
articles.title: Two-Year Investigation Yields Partial Recovery in Crypto Scam

articles.author: Regina Capuz
articles.description: Regina never thought she’d be writing about games again, let alone Web3 games. But she was given the opportunity to lead a new recurring Web3 gaming segment. She is live streaming her adventure For her first game, Regina became fully immersed in the world of Spellborne — a Web3 game that has reignited her love […]
articles.title: Regina’s Web3 Gaming Odyssey: My First Web3 Quest

articles.author: Terence Zimwara
articles.description: The UK’s crypto community has a reason for optimism with the new Labour government, according to Harry Horsfall. Backed by a large parliamentary majority, the Labour government is seen as potentially more decisive in pushing policies favourable to the Web3 industry. Horsfall, CEO of Flight3, which will host the Zebu Live Conference in October, also […]
articles.title: Web3 Innovator: UK Crypto Community Sees Brighter Future Under Labour Government

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
Market participants are eagerly awaiting the upcoming Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting, which is expected to play a crucial role in shaping the short-term outlook for Bitcoin and other digital assets. The spotlight is on the potential for an interest rate cut, and many traders and investors have been speculating about it for some time now. 
 
Although the exact magnitude of the rate cut has not yet been confirmed, there is widespread anticipation that the FOMC will opt for either a 25-basis point reduction or a more substantial 50-basis point cut. According to a prominent economist, FOMC’s decision could either lead to a sell-the-news event for risky assets like Bitcoin or give them a boost.
 
Economist Predicts Massive ‘Sell The News’ Event
 
In a recent conversation with The …
articles.title: Time To Dump Bitcoin? Economist Predicts Massive ‘Sell The News’ Event

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: The U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) has sentenced 12 individuals for a series of violent home invasions aimed at stealing over $3.5 million in cryptocurrency. The group’s leader received 47 years in prison, while his accomplice was sentenced to 20 years. “The victims were held at gunpoint in their home,” the DOJ stated, adding that […]
articles.title: US Sentences 12 in $3.5 Million Cryptocurrency Heist Involving Violent Home Invasions

articles.author: Marc Hochstein
articles.description: The regulator pleaded with the court to halt Kalshi's political prediction markets for the duration of the CFTC's appeal.
articles.title: 'An Explosion of Election Gambling' Is Nigh, CFTC Warns Appeals Court

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: A bitcoin investor has pleaded guilty to underreporting his cryptocurrency gains, including $3.7 million from BTC sales, resulting in a tax loss to the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) of over $550,000. The Department of Justice emphasized that taxpayers must accurately report crypto transactions to the IRS. The bitcoin investor now faces up to three years […]
articles.title: Bitcoin Investor Faces Prison Time for Underreporting Crypto Gains

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: Swift has unveiled a plan to enable the movement of digital assets and currencies on its global payment network. The initiative aims to integrate regulated digital currencies into Swift’s platform, building on past experiments. “We’re paving the way towards real-world solutions that will enable our members to access and transact with regulated digital assets and […]
articles.title: Swift Unveils Plan to Integrate Digital Assets and Currencies Into Global Payment Network

articles.author: Opeyemi Sule
articles.description:
A lot has been made of the Bitcoin price history in September, putting extra spotlight on the largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. Despite the somewhat wobbly start and generally bearish expectations, the premier cryptocurrency has not exactly had a woeful stint in this historically negative month.
 
The price of BTC has been on quite a run in the last seven-day period, breaking the psychological $60,000 level to close the week. A popular crypto pundit, however, has come forward with an interesting prognosis for the Bitcoin price over the coming days.
 
BTC Price Approaching Key Resistance — Here’s The Level
 
In a new post on the X platform, prominent crypto analyst Ali Martinez revealed that Bitcoin’s latest price surge could face major on-chain resistance around the $60,680 …
articles.title: Bitcoin Price Continues Recovery, Breaks Above $60,000 — What Next?
